title: Looking for a silver ADC or jungler
body:
add me ingame and ill give you a look if youre interested.  we have all slots full except a jungle and adc.  must have at least 3 champions playable in the role you are trying out for.

My IGN is RyanC525
send me a message stating your rank, role, and best 5 champs in that role
Thanks everyone :D

replies.body:
Name: Bobbalife
Rank: silver 5 
Position: Jungle(mainly)/ADC
Champs: anything meta or off but if i have to choose 3 Lee Sin Vi Jarvan 4/Sivir Corki Graves

Itachihatake
Main all roles :p
Silver 5 ( for now)
Main wuking, lee sin, nidalee Jung,
Main ez, caitlyn, lucian adc
